text: The name Soryu could refer to: * Japanese aircraft carrier Sōryū, an Imperial Japanese Navy aircraft carrier scuttled during the Battle of Midway on 4 June 1942 * Sōryū-class submarine, a ship class of Japanese submarines * JS Sōryū, the lead submarine of the Sōryū class * Asuka Langley Soryu, a 14-year-old fictional character from the Neon Genesis Evangelion franchise.
title: Soryu
